io.sphere.sdk.customergroups

Interface CustomerGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, Identifiable<CustomerGroup>, Referenceable<CustomerGroup>, Resource<CustomerGroup>, ResourceIdentifiable<CustomerGroup>, ResourceView<CustomerGroup,CustomerGroup>, Timestamped, Versioned<CustomerGroup>

    public interface CustomerGroup
extends Resource<CustomerGroup>

    A Customer can be a member of a customer group (e.g. reseller, gold member). Special prices can be assigned to specific products based on a customer group.

    See Also:
    CustomerGroupCreateCommand, CustomerGroupUpdateCommand, CustomerGroupDeleteCommand, CustomerGroupQuery, CustomerGroupByIdGet, SetCustomerGroup, Customer.getCustomerGroup()
